text: Dhangadhi is the headquarters of the Kailali district in Nepal. In the Kailali district, the people of various castes, religion and from different personalities exist. Dhangadhi is the gateway to nearby tourist places like Shuklaphanta National Park, Ghodaghodi Lake and Khaptad National Park. It is the connecting city between nearby cities of Mahendranagar, Attariya and Dipayal Silgadhi. It is also a land route to enter Nepal from India. The Dhangadhi is the popular place of all over the Sudurpaschim district. There are well infrastructures, high facilities of education, health, transportation & communication. etc. Category:Cities in Nepal
title: Dhangadhi
